page_content: The page provides various templates and forms related to cantonal civil engineering.
The page offers various reports and guidelines on groundwater management and protection.
The page provides information on the registration process for E-Voting in the Canton of St.Gallen.
The page provides access to two statistical databases, STADA and STADA2, along with user manuals.
The page provides an online platform for submitting documents related to the establishment, modification, or deletion of a company, requiring a qualified electronic signature.
The page offers an online service called KantonsChecker for verifying official survey data sets in the Canton of St.Gallen.
The page provides various forms and documents for the management of special schools, including accounting and presence recording tools.
